card2.title: Matching
card2.text1: Match developers in n days on average

review1.text: We were worried about the high cost of outsourcing development, but we were able to solve it through satisfactory planning and continuous feedback at a reasonable quote.

review2.text: Given my lack of development knowledge, I was worried that it would be difficult to communicate with the outsourced developer, but the communication was seamless and the launch was flawless.

review3.text: Working with Berkeley Consulting's development/design team, we were able to get through the ongoing additions and change requests in a timely manner.

review4.text: Because the design and work plan were calculated in installments, I was able to pick and choose the skills I needed and incorporate them into the service without feeling overwhelmed.

review5.text: They shared accurate quotes and schedules, so I felt confident in their maintenance.

review6.text: Feedback on development budgets and scope based on the size of the organization made it easy to work through the development from start to finish.

review7.text: Throughout the project with Vulcan, I was most pleased with the consultation and feedback on estimates and development timelines.

review8.text: We were able to get a professional service at a much more reasonable cost than other companies quoted.

review9.text: We had a global development team, a large pool of partners, and because we were building in English from the ground up, we were able to save a lot of money overall.

review10.text: It was quite a process from quotation consultation to contract, but I could tell that the company had a good understanding of the IT industry and services and managed the process systematically.

faq.mainTitle: Have any questions? Get in Touch
faq.title: Frequently asked questions

faq1.question: 1. I'd like an estimate of the cost.
faq1.answer: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.
